ygData.subject: Re: Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)
ygData.msgSnippet: Ummm, hate to break it to you but I have probably throw over 200 stars in my 12 levels, DOH! that s 2pp in stars, oh well at least now I have Bellow. BTW throw
ygData.messageBody:
Ummm, hate to break it to you but I have probably throw over 200 stars in my
12 levels, DOH! that's 2pp in stars, oh well at least now I have Bellow.
BTW throw that dirk accidentally once and its gone forever, double DOH!


-----Original Message-----
From: Dan Bouchard [mailto:dbouch@...]
Sent: Wednesday, June 16, 1999 7:08 PM
To: eqbards@onelist.com
Subject: Re: [eqbards] Dragoon Dirk (off topic somewhat?)


From: "Dan Bouchard" <dbouch@...>

Quick note in case some of you don't know:

The Dragoon Dirk can be equipped in your ranged weapon slot. This is
good if you don't use Piercing but still want to reap the magical benefits
of the Dirk. We can't use ranged weapons, so we might as well make some use
of that slot.

--Danner Bramblethorn
Tarrew Marr
